pr_title: Fix category links in media detail

timeline.message: Fix category links in media detail

timeline.bodyText: The CategoryClientKt.CATEGORY_PREFIX static import in this file is not necessary anymore. So, it can be removed.
timeline.author: sivaraam

timeline.bodyText: I believe it's better to use the CATEGORY_PREFIX variable from CategoryClient here rather than hard coding the prefix.
timeline.author: sivaraam

replies.bodyText: You're right, I have done that now.
replies.author: FliegendeWurst
